City Council

Meetings


  • 2nd and 4th Thursday of each month
  • 6:00p.m.
  • City Council Chambers
    212 Main Street
    Lake Dallas, TX 75065

Agendas & Minutes


Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.
